config.wynn_weapon_viewer.title: Wynn Weapon Bigger Configuration
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.enabled: Enable or disable the Wynn Weapon Bigger mod
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.scale.t: Set the scale of the zoomed item (0.1 to 2.0)
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.alignme: Set the horizontal alignment of the zoomed item
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.xOffset: Set the horizontal offset of the zoomed item
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.yOffset: Set the vertical offset of the zoomed item
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.showTog: Show a message when toggling the item zoom
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.enableU: Enable zoom for unidentified Wynncraft items
config.wynn_weapon_viewer.option.enableC: Enable zoom for Corkian Amplifiers and related items
